divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving from church to my house with my radio off and i was alone in the street no cars were around that area...... i looked up... and this yellow lights cough my attention.. i was like wat the hell is that.. yellow light and the object was round.. lights were going on and off in a circle..i parked and recorded it.. i called my friend jake he lives in Huntington park... he went out side his house and saw it as well..then his siblings called more friends from church that live in Compton.they also saw the UFO... .i later on that night i got home showed it my family... my phone was in vibration mode... i played it with volume and i am able to hear sum weird voices... so i am willing to give this video up to any now that might be willing to buy it for research.. now if u guys are willing to get it give me a call.. i got a call a week ago but i wasnt home after that no one has called me back.. so i guys are willing to get it call me up we can arrange on a fee that we both would agree on... its not fake i have the original video capture from my phone.. just call me up i would be glad to give it up to any one that wants to buy it for research..
Summary: the ufo was flying by los angeles convention center
